alert.note: Alert for Outagamie; Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 12:20PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood, Portage, Winnebago, Waushara, Waupaca and western Outagamie Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Wisconsin Rapids to Wautoma. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph...heavy rain and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Localized flooding possible. Locations impacted include... Appleton, Oshkosh, Stevens Point, Wisconsin Rapids, Waupaca, Wautoma, Marshfield, Menasha, New London and Clintonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Outagamie; Portage; Waupaca; Waushara; Winnebago; Wood
